item.name: Air Freshener
item.description:
The label says it is “Flower-Scented”.
Assassin: I could probably use that. This whole mansion smells like bullshit.

action.name: Take
action.description: Assassin: Though I don’t think this one can is capable of getting rid of all of it...

action.name: Back
action.description: Assassin: Nevermind. Let’s just breathe bullshit nonstop.
